conwech package¶

The conwech package is comprised of two primary submodules: lexicon, and functions. All of the members in functions along with a few select members of lexicon are imported into the top level of the package for easy access. Flat > nested, but organization = imperative.

Two additional submodules exceptions and regexlib are essentially repositories for… well, exactly what it sounds like. Both submodules are considered pseudo-internal, but feel free to muck around till your heart’s content.

Submodules¶

  • conwech.exceptions module
  • conwech.functions module
  • conwech.lexicon module
  • conwech.regexlib module

Command line interface¶

conwech¶

usage: conwech [-h] SUBCOMMAND ...
-h, --help¶

show this help message and exit

conwech read¶

usage: conwech read [-h] [-c] text
text¶

text of a number to read

-h, --help¶

show this help message and exit

-c, --copy¶

copy output to clipboard

conwech spell¶

usage: conwech spell [-h] [-c] [-r] number
number¶

a number to be spelled

-h, --help¶

show this help message and exit

-c, --copy¶

copy output to clipboard

-r, --recursive¶

spell recursively to ‘four’
